languages.text: "Стальные творения, призванные служить целям Истины. Ты видел{mf||а} изящность их форм? Их безукоризненную эргономику? Но это лишь оболочки. Настоящее совершенство наполняет их, когда в них вдыхают искру жизни и дают предназначение — обрушить свою ярость на головы апостатов. Когда эта армия будет собрана... Впрочем, к чему слова. Ты сам{mf||а} узришь крупицу того великолепия, что уготовано {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простору Коронус{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Стальные творения, призванные служить целям Истины, выходят из этого мануфакторума и отправляются в глубины Кьява Гамма — туда, где мой коллега вдыхает искру жизни в готовые исполнить свое предназначение машины. Те оболочки, что лежат на лентах в этом периметре, еще мертвы... но не эта". {n}Фабрикатор выпускает бинарную трель — и массивный конструкт рядом с ним начинает шевелиться.{/n}

languages.text: "Steel creations destined to serve the designs of Truth. Did you see the elegance of their form? Their flawless ergonomics? And those are mere shells. True perfection fills them when they are instilled with the spark of life and granted purpose — to bring their wrath upon the heads of apostates. Once this army is assembled— but why waste words? You will see for yourself a modicum of the splendour that is in store for the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."
languages.original_text: "Стальные творения, призванные служить целям Истины. Ты видел{mf||а} изящность их форм? Их безукоризненную эргономику? Но это лишь оболочки. Настоящее совершенство наполняет их, когда в них вдыхают искру жизни и дают предназначение — обрушить свою ярость на головы апостатов. Когда эта армия будет собрана... Впрочем, к чему слова. Ты сам{mf||а} узришь крупицу того великолепия, что уготовано {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простору Коронус{/g}".

True perfection fills them when they are instilled with the spark of life and granted purpose — to bring their wrath upon the heads of apostates. Once this army is assembled... Then again, why waste words? You will see for yourself a modicum of the splendour that is in store for the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."

languages.text: “钢铁的造物注定要为真理的设计服务。你看到它们优雅的外形了吗？看到它们完美的人体工学设计了吗？这些还仅仅是外壳而已。当我为它们灌输生命的火花，赋予它们使命之后，它们便会成为真正完美的造物。它们会将它们的怒火倾泻在叛教者的头上。等到这支大军集结完毕之后，你就会亲眼见到我为{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}带来的辉煌。不过，我又何必在这里和你浪费口舌呢？”
languages.original_text: "Steel creations destined to serve the designs of Truth. Did you see the elegance of their form? Their flawless ergonomics? And those are mere shells. True perfection fills them when they are instilled with the spark of life and granted purpose — to bring their wrath upon the heads of apostates. Once this army is assembled— but why waste words? You will see for yourself a modicum of the splendour that is in store for the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."

traits.locale_text: “钢铁的造物注定要为真理的设计服务。你看到它们优雅的外形了吗？看到它们完美的人体工学设计了吗？这些还仅仅是外壳而已。当我为它们灌输生命的火花，赋予它们使命之后，它们便会成为真正完美的造物。它们会将它们的怒火倾泻在叛教者的头上。等到这支大军集结完毕之后，你就会亲眼见到我为{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}带来的辉煌。不过，我又何必在这里和你浪费口舌呢？”

languages.text: «Creaciones de acero al servicio de la Verdad. ¿Ha visto la elegancia de sus formas? ¿Su impecable ergonomía? Y eso no son más que los cascarones. La verdadera perfección llegará cuando se les otorgue la chispa de la vida y una razón de ser: hacer caer su ira sobre los apóstatas. Cuando el ejército esté organizado... ¿para qué malgastar palabras? Le mostraré una parte ínfima del esplendor que le espera a la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}».
languages.original_text: "Steel creations destined to serve the designs of Truth. Did you see the elegance of their form? Their flawless ergonomics? And those are mere shells. True perfection fills them when they are instilled with the spark of life and granted purpose — to bring their wrath upon the heads of apostates. Once this army is assembled— but why waste words? You will see for yourself a modicum of the splendour that is in store for the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."

traits.locale_text: «Creaciones de acero al servicio de la Verdad. ¿Ha visto la elegancia de sus formas? ¿Su impecable ergonomía? Y eso no son más que los cascarones. La verdadera perfección llegará cuando se les otorgue la chispa de la vida y una razón de ser: hacer caer su ira sobre los apóstatas. Cuando el ejército esté organizado... ¿para qué malgastar palabras? Le mostraré una parte ínfima del esplendor que le espera a la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}».

languages.text: 「真実の設計に仕えることを定められた鋼鉄の創造物。そのフォルムの優美さを見たか？その完璧な人間工学を見たか？そしてあれは単なる抜け殻だ。輝く命が吹き込まれて、背教者に怒りの雷を落とすという目的が与えられたとき、真の完璧さで満たされる。この軍隊が集まれば…いや、話すのは無駄か？{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}に待ち受ける素晴らしい事のほんの一部を、お前は自分の目で確かめられるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Steel creations destined to serve the designs of Truth. Did you see the elegance of their form? Their flawless ergonomics? And those are mere shells. True perfection fills them when they are instilled with the spark of life and granted purpose — to bring their wrath upon the heads of apostates. Once this army is assembled— but why waste words? You will see for yourself a modicum of the splendour that is in store for the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."

traits.locale_text: 「真実の設計に仕えることを定められた鋼鉄の創造物。そのフォルムの優美さを見たか？その完璧な人間工学を見たか？そしてあれは単なる抜け殻だ。輝く命が吹き込まれて、背教者に怒りの雷を落とすという目的が与えられたとき、真の完璧さで満たされる。この軍隊が集まれば…いや、話すのは無駄か？{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}に待ち受ける素晴らしい事のほんの一部を、お前は自分の目で確かめられるだろう」

languages.text: "Stahlschöpfungen in Diensten der Pläne der Wahrheit. Habt Ihr die Eleganz der Formen gesehen? Die fehlerlose Ergonomie? Und das sind nur Hüllen. Wahre Perfektion wird sie erfüllen, wenn ihnen der Funke des Lebens und eine Aufgabe zuteil wird – Zorn über die Abtrünnigen zu bringen. Sobald diese Armee steht ... Doch wozu Worte verschwenden? Ihr werdet die Pracht selbst sehen, die die {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} erwartet."
languages.original_text: "Steel creations destined to serve the designs of Truth. Did you see the elegance of their form? Their flawless ergonomics? And those are mere shells. True perfection fills them when they are instilled with the spark of life and granted purpose — to bring their wrath upon the heads of apostates. Once this army is assembled— but why waste words? You will see for yourself a modicum of the splendour that is in store for the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Stahlschöpfungen in Diensten der Pläne der Wahrheit. Habt Ihr die Eleganz der Formen gesehen? Die fehlerlose Ergonomie? Und das sind nur Hüllen. Wahre Perfektion wird sie erfüllen, wenn ihnen der Funke des Lebens und eine Aufgabe zuteil wird – Zorn über die Abtrünnigen zu bringen. Sobald diese Armee steht ... Doch wozu Worte verschwenden? Ihr werdet die Pracht selbst sehen, die die {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} erwartet."

languages.text: « Des créations en acier destinées à servir les desseins de la Vérité. Voyez leurs formes élégantes et leur ergonomie irréprochable. Et ce ne sont que de simples coquilles. La véritable perfection les emplira lorsqu'elles recevront l'étincelle de la vie et le but de leur existence : faire s'abattre leur courroux sur les apostats. Une fois cette armée levée, elle... mais pourquoi gaspiller mon temps ? Vous allez voir de vos propres yeux un aperçu de la splendeur qui attend les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "Steel creations destined to serve the designs of Truth. Did you see the elegance of their form? Their flawless ergonomics? And those are mere shells. True perfection fills them when they are instilled with the spark of life and granted purpose — to bring their wrath upon the heads of apostates. Once this army is assembled— but why waste words? You will see for yourself a modicum of the splendour that is in store for the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « Des créations en acier destinées à servir les desseins de la Vérité. Voyez leurs formes élégantes et leur ergonomie irréprochable. Et ce ne sont que de simples coquilles. La véritable perfection les emplira lorsqu'elles recevront l'étincelle de la vie et le but de leur existence : faire s'abattre leur courroux sur les apostats. Une fois cette armée levée, elle... mais pourquoi gaspiller mon temps ? Vous allez voir de vos propres yeux un aperçu de la splendeur qui attend les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. »

languages.text: "Hakikat'in tasarımlarına hizmet edecek çelik yaratımlar... Biçimlerinin zarafetini gördün mü? Kusursuz ergonomilerini... Ki bunlar daha mahfaza. Hayat kıvılcımı aşılanıp mürtetlerin başına salınma amacı verildiğinde, hakiki mükemmellik onları dolduracak. Bu ordu toplandıktan sonra... Gerçi neden boş boş konuşuyoruz ki? {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'ne{/g} layık görülen ihtişamın bir raddesini gözlerinle göreceksin zaten."
languages.original_text: "Steel creations destined to serve the designs of Truth. Did you see the elegance of their form? Their flawless ergonomics? And those are mere shells. True perfection fills them when they are instilled with the spark of life and granted purpose — to bring their wrath upon the heads of apostates. Once this army is assembled— but why waste words? You will see for yourself a modicum of the splendour that is in store for the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Hakikat'in tasarımlarına hizmet edecek çelik yaratımlar... Biçimlerinin zarafetini gördün mü? Kusursuz ergonomilerini... Ki bunlar daha mahfaza. Hakiki mükemmellik, hayat kıvılcımı aşılanıp bir amaç verildiğinde dolduracak onları gazaplarını mürtetlerin başına salmak için. Bu ordu toplandıktan sonra... Gerçi neden boş boş konuşuyoruz ki? {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'ne layık görülen ihtişamın bir raddesini gözlerinle göreceksin zaten."
